actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to require approval by the House of Representatives with respect to the fixing or adjustment of certain allowances for Members of the House.

summary.text: Requires that any proposal by the Committee on House Administration to fix or adjust any allowance for Members of the House of Representatives, the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico, or the Delegate from the District of Columbia must be approved by resolution adopted by the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Resolution to require approval by the House of Representatives with respect to the fixing or adjustment of certain allowances for Members of the House.
